verbs.description: [ARG1: Gruesome violence] [V: directed] [ARG2: against unarmed protesters] is becoming a terrifyingly regular occurrence in Gaza , where another huge storm of protests was just inspired by the Trump administration moving the U.S. embassy from Tel Aviv to Jerusalem . Gazans massed near the borders of their open - air prison , with some attempting to break through the fence . The Israeli military responded by spraying live ammunition into the crowd and bombing several targets ...
